channel.title: A weekly bootstrapping email
channel.description:
I've just launched a little email list, [Bootstrapping IO][1], where I'll be collating a handful of useful links for people trying to do what we do. If you think it'd be useful for you please sign up!
I'd have put this in my intro post, but the forum told me off for attempting too many links!
[1]: http://bootstrapping.io

item.title: A weekly bootstrapping email

item.description:
